<title level="1" right="Rules">[Prone and Incapacitated Creatures](/Rules.aspx?ID=2361)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 422 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can share a space with a [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88) creature if that creature is willing, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), or dead and if it is your size or smaller. The GM might allow you to climb atop the corpse or unconscious body of a larger creature in some situations. A prone creature can’t stand up while someone else occupies its space, but it can [Crawl](/Actions.aspx?ID=2293) to a space where it’s able to stand, or it can attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) the other creature out of the way.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
